forum.name: bugs and glitches

forum.latestCommentText: im on index and that way be the problem. other people can drop them in.

thread.title: area name bug?

comments.text: apparently nebula (who isn't an editor here) has the little keyboard showing up to allow him to change the name of the area (isle of styx).
the keyboard also shows up for me in other areas where i shouldn't have editing rights to change things.
we haven't tested to see if it will actually change the name of an area if we enter a new name, in case we break something.
Thanks, this issue should be fixed now... can you confirm?

thread.latestCommentText: Thanks, this issue should be fixed now... can you confirm?
